module.title: Guestbook
Guestbook
Guestbook
module.description: Provide Guestbook module to XE users, contains administrator functions such as create, delete, manage Guestbook module etc.
给用户提供‘留言簿’功能，将包含‘留言簿’模块的生成/删除及管理等管理员功能。
Provide Guestbook module to XE users, contains administrator functions such as create, delete, manage Guestbook module etc.
